alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 9:33PM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Fredonia and Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. The period of heaviest snow is expected tonight through Thursday morning and again Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Additional snow forecast from 9 PM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Fredonia 0 to 1 inches Jacob Lake 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
